## Multi-threaded backend

::: {.callout-note}

- Avoids serialization
- Avoids interprocess communication costs 

:::

::: {#cell-config-threads .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
dask.config.set(scheduler='threads')
```

::: {#config-threads .cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}

## Multi-process backend

::: {.callout-note}

- Avoids Python's Global Interpreter Lock (GIL)

:::

::: {#cell-setup-multiprocessor .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
dic_config = {
  "multiprocessing.context": "forkserver",
  "scheduler": "processes"
}

dask.config.set(
  **dic_config
)
```

::: {#setup-multiprocessor .cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
```
<dask.config.set at 0x7b897b2dcaa0>
```
:::
:::
